argument.name: CR-LF_List
argument.description: A list of items, each separated by CR-LF codes.

argument.name: Source
argument.description: A list of items, each separated by a comma.

page.description: Converts a comma delimited list to a CrLf delimited list.
page.discussion: The COMMA_TO_CRLF() function converts a comma delimited list to a CR-LF delimited list.

see.ref: How to implement comma_to_crlf honoring delimiters
